content.en: Ensemble Credit Risk: Ensemble classifiers have the potential to improve the accuracy of credit risk prediction, according to a study. Another study found that classifier ensembles significantly improve classification performance in credit risk prediction. Bagging was found to perform better than Boosting in improving the accuracy of credit scoring. The C4.5 decision tree was identified as the best solution for most ensemble methods in credit scoring.
content.da: Ensemble Kreditrisiko: Ifølge en undersøgelse har ensemble klassifikatorer potentiale til at forbedre nøjagtigheden af kreditrisikovurdering. En anden undersøgelse fandt, at ensemble klassifikatorer væsentligt forbedrer klassificeringsydelsen i kreditrisikovurdering. "Bagging" viste sig at præstere bedre end "Boosting" i at forbedre nøjagtigheden af kreditvurdering. C4.5 beslutningstræet blev identificeret som den bedste løsning for de fleste ensemblemetoder i kreditvurdering.
